summary: The pilot for the TV series "The Man From U.N.C.L.E.," re-edited and released to theaters as a feature.
cast: Robert Vaughn|Luciana Paluzzi|Pat Crowley|Fritz Weaver|William Marshall|Will Kuluva|David McCallum|Ivan Dixon|Victoria Shaw|Eric Berry|Miguel Ángel Landa|Robert Brubaker|John Bryant|Rupert Crosse|Sharyn Hillyer|Roy Jenson|Kenner G. Kemp|Richard Kiel|Joseph V. Perry|Mario Siletti Jr.|Joyce Taylor
title: Trampa para un espía
